#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int main() {
  int T; cin >> T;
  for (int _ = 0; _ < T; ++_) {
    string s;
    int k; 
    cin >> s >> k;
    int n(0);
    for (size_t i = 0; i < s.size(); ++i) {
      n = (n * 10 + s[i] - '0') % k;
    }
    puts(n == 0 ? "YES" : "NO");
  }
  return 0;
}
